name: 01-literals-basic
input:
// 基础字面量
const num = 42
const str = "hello"
const bool = true
const nul = null
const undef = undefined

name: 02-literals-numbers
input:
// 各种数字字面量
const decimal = 100
const binary = 0b1010
const octal = 0o755
const hex = 0xFF
const float = 3.14
const exp = 1e5
const negative = -42

name: 03-strings-basic
input:
// 字符串字面量
const single = 'hello'
const double = "world"
const escaped = "line1\nline2"
const unicode = "\u0041"
const empty = ""

name: 04-template-literals
input:
// 模板字符串
const name = "Alice"
const age = 25
const basic = `Hello ${name}`
const multi = `Name: ${name}
Age: ${age}`
const nested = `Result: ${1 + 2}`

name: 05-arrays-objects-basic
06-let-const
input:
// let和const声明
let x = 1
const y = 2
let a, b, c
a = 10
b = 20
c = 30

name: 07-var-hoisting
08-multiple-declarations
input:
// 多个声明
let a = 1, b = 2, c = 3
const x = 10, y = 20
var m, n = 5, p = 6

name: 09-block-scope
10-shadowing
11-function-declaration
12-function-expression
13-iife
14-arrow-basic
input:
// 基础箭头函数
const add = (a, b) => a + b
const square = x => x * x
const greet = () => "Hello"
const identity = x => x

name: 15-arrow-body
16-default-parameters
17-rest-parameters
18-arrow-rest
19-array-destructuring-basic
input:
// 基础数组解构
const [a, b] = [1, 2]
const [x, y, z] = [10, 20, 30]
let [first, second]
;[first, second] = [100, 200]

name: 20-array-destructuring-skip
input:
// 跳过元素
const [a, , c] = [1, 2, 3]
const [, , third] = [10, 20, 30]
const [first, , , fourth] = [1, 2, 3, 4]

name: 21-array-destructuring-rest
input:
// 数组rest解构
const [first, ...rest] = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
const [a, b, ...others] = [10, 20, 30, 40]
const [...all] = [1, 2, 3]

name: 22-array-destructuring-nested
input:
// 嵌套数组解构
const [a, [b, c]] = [1, [2, 3]]
const [[x, y], z] = [[10, 20], 30]
const [first, [second, [third]]] = [1, [2, [3]]]

name: 23-object-destructuring-basic
24-object-destructuring-rename
25-object-destructuring-nested
output:
const {user: {name,age}} = {user:{name:'Charlie',age:35,},};
const {a: {b: {c}}} = {a:{b:{c:100,},},};

name: 26-destructuring-defaults
27-array-spread
input:
// 数组spread
const arr1 = [1, 2, 3]
const arr2 = [...arr1]
const combined = [...arr1, 4, 5]
const multi = [0, ...arr1, ...arr2, 6]

name: 28-function-spread
29-rest-in-destructuring
output:
const [first,...rest] = [1,2,3,4,5,];
const {a,...others} = {a:1,b:2,c:3,};

name: 30-spread-complex
input:
// 复杂spread
const arr = [1, 2]
const nested = [[...arr], [...arr, 3]]
const func = (...args) => [...args, ...args]

name: 38-class-complex
39-export-default
output:
export default function greet(name){
  return 'Hello ' + name}

name: 40-export-named
41-export-rename
42-import-basic
input:
// 基础导入
import defaultExport from './module.js'
import {named1, named2} from './module.js'
import * as everything from './module.js'

name: 43-import-rename
input:
// 导入重命名
import {name as userName} from './user.js'
import {value as myValue, func as myFunc} from './utils.js'
import {default as MyClass} from './class.js'

name: 44-export-from
input:
// export from
export {name, age} from './user.js'
export {default as Person} from './person.js'
export * from './utils.js'
export {value as myValue} from './config.js'
output: export {name, age} from './user.js'export {default as Person} from './person.js'export * from './utils.js'export {value as myValue} from './config.js'
